languages.text: "Полученные сведения служат основанием, чтобы подвергнуть сомнению гипотезу павшего технобрата Тарзуса. //Из почтения к последователям//За отсутствием авторизации к осуждению последователей// Мессии Прерывания мы прекращаем процедуру //задержания//ареста//ликвидации//".

"The data received provides a basis for calling the fallen Tech-Brother Tarzus's hypothesis into question. //Out of respect for//Due to lack of authorisation to indict// the followers of the Messiah of Discontinuing, we will not proceed with the //detainment//arrest//termination//."
languages.original_text: "Полученные сведения служат основанием, чтобы подвергнуть сомнению гипотезу павшего технобрата Тарзуса. //Из почтения к последователям//За отсутствием авторизации к осуждению последователей// Мессии Прерывания мы прекращаем процедуру //задержания//ареста//ликвидации//".

languages.text: 「受領したデータは堕ちた技術同胞ターザスの仮説に疑問を投げかける根拠となる。廃絶の救世主の信者//に敬意を払って//を告発する権限がないため//、我々は//拘束//逮捕//停止//の手続きを行わない」
languages.original_text: "The data received provides a basis for calling the fallen Tech-Brother Tarzus's hypothesis into question. //Out of respect for//Due to lack of authorisation to indict// the followers of the Messiah of Discontinuing, we will not proceed with the //detainment//arrest//termination//."

traits.locale_text: 「受領したデータは堕ちた技術同胞ターザスの仮説に疑問を投げかける根拠となる。廃絶の救世主の信者//に敬意を払って//を告発する権限がないため//、我々は//拘束//逮捕//停止//の手続きを行わない」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “已经收集到了足够的数据，足以对阵亡的技术兄弟塔祖斯的假设提出质疑。//出于尊重//由于缺乏起诉权利//，本单位在此结束对‘终结的弥赛亚’追随者的追捕行动，我们将不再进行//拘留//逮捕//终止//。”
languages.original_text: "The data received provides a basis for calling the fallen Tech-Brother Tarzus's hypothesis into question. //Out of respect for//Due to lack of authorisation to indict// the followers of the Messiah of Discontinuing, we will not proceed with the //detainment//arrest//termination//."

traits.locale_text: “已经收集到了足够的数据，足以对阵亡的技术兄弟塔祖斯的假设提出质疑。//出于尊重//由于缺乏起诉权利//，本单位在此结束对‘终结的弥赛亚’追随者的追捕行动，我们将不再进行//拘留//逮捕//终止//。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Die erhaltenen Daten liefern eine Basis, um die Hypothese des gefallenen Tech-Bruders Tarzus anzuzweifeln. //Aus Respekt vor den//Aufgrund mangelnder Autorisierung zur Anklage von// Anhängern des Messias der Unterbrechung werden wir die //Haft//Verhaftung//Terminierung// nicht fortsetzen."
languages.original_text: "The data received provides a basis for calling the fallen Tech-Brother Tarzus's hypothesis into question. //Out of respect for//Due to lack of authorisation to indict// the followers of the Messiah of Discontinuing, we will not proceed with the //detainment//arrest//termination//."

traits.locale_text: "Die erhaltenen Daten liefern eine Basis, um die Hypothese des gefallenen Tech-Bruders Tarzus anzuzweifeln. //Aus Respekt vor den//Aufgrund mangelnder Autorisierung zur Anklage von// Anhängern des Messias der Unterbrechung werden wir die //Haft//Verhaftung//Terminierung// nicht fortsetzen."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Les données reçues dernièrement constituent une base suffisante pour remettre en doute l'hypothèse du défunt technofrère Tarzus. //Par respect envers//Faute d'habilitation à inculper// les disciples du Messie de l'Interruption, nous ne procéderons pas à //la mise en détention//l'arrestation//la neutralisation// de l'individu susnommé. »
languages.original_text: "The data received provides a basis for calling the fallen Tech-Brother Tarzus's hypothesis into question. //Out of respect for//Due to lack of authorisation to indict// the followers of the Messiah of Discontinuing, we will not proceed with the //detainment//arrest//termination//."

traits.locale_text: « Les données reçues dernièrement constituent une base suffisante pour remettre en doute l'hypothèse du défunt technofrère Tarzus. //Par respect envers//Faute d'habilitation à inculper// les disciples du Messie de l'Interruption, nous ne procéderons pas à //la mise en détention//l'arrestation//la neutralisation// de l'individu susnommé. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Los datos recibidos proporcionan una base sólida para poner en tela de juicio la hipótesis del tecnohermano caído Tarzus. //Por respeto a//Debido a la falta de autorización para acusar a// los adeptos del Mesías de la Discontinuidad, no procederemos con //la detención//el arresto//la eliminación//».
languages.original_text: "The data received provides a basis for calling the fallen Tech-Brother Tarzus's hypothesis into question. //Out of respect for//Due to lack of authorisation to indict// the followers of the Messiah of Discontinuing, we will not proceed with the //detainment//arrest//termination//."

traits.locale_text: «Los datos recibidos proporcionan una base sólida para poner en tela de juicio la hipótesis del tecnohermano caído Tarzus. //Por respeto a//Debido a la falta de autorización para acusar a// los adeptos del Mesías de la Discontinuidad, no procederemos con //la detención//el arresto//la eliminación».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Elde edilen veri, kaybettiğimiz Tekno Kardeşimiz Tarzus'un hipotezi konusunda soru işaretleri yaratıyor. Bozulum Mesihi'nin takipçilerine //saygıdan//ceza verme yetkisinin noksanlığından// ötürü //alıkoyma//tutuklama//imha etme// işlemine devam etmeyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "The data received provides a basis for calling the fallen Tech-Brother Tarzus's hypothesis into question. //Out of respect for//Due to lack of authorisation to indict// the followers of the Messiah of Discontinuing, we will not proceed with the //detainment//arrest//termination//."

traits.locale_text: "Elde edilen veri, kaybettiğimiz Tekno Kardeşimiz Tarzus'un hipotezi konusunda soru işaretleri yaratıyor. Devamsızlık Mesihi'nin takipçilerine //saygıdan//ceza verme yetkisinin noksanlığından// ötürü //alıkoyma//tutuklama//imha etme// işlemine devam etmeyeceğiz."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
